name: Low Poly FPS (Pau Barto)
description:
This game has 2 levels: the forest and the secret base. To open the basement's door you need to score 2000 points in the shooting alley minigame.

There are 2 guns: the ak and the pistol.

Pistol gives you more accuracy and movement speed, the ak does more damage and has a bigger mag size.

CONTROLS: 

W,A,S,D -- Move

Space -- Jump

Left Shift -- Run

1 -- Switch to  Ak

2 -- Switch to  pistol

SHOOTING: 

Left Mouse Button -- Shoot 

Right Mouse Button -- Aim
